title: Narrative-Based Mathematical Leadership Design: Counter-Narrative Development and Critical Reflection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Narrative design and critical thinking training to strengthen mathematical education leadership in a smartphone-based mobile environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze three or more key narratives occurring in math education settings
Learners can develop counter-narratives to existing math education narratives to propose alternative perspectives
Learners can enhance decision-making skills through critical reflection in math education leadership contexts
Learners can complete 80% or more of microlearning content (5-minute videos/quizzes) produced in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
